alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Cuyama Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Palos Verdes Hills; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Lucia Mountains; Santa Ynez Valley; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 1:06PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, Santa Lucia Mountains, San Luis Obispo County Mountains, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Santa Ynez Valley, Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Lake Casitas, Los Angeles County Beaches, Palos Verdes Hills, Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills, Antelope Valley, and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
